Family Suite

  • Home
  • Our Rooms
  • Family Suite

The "Levant" & "Port-Cros" Family Suite

You will love these two rooms* with their ideal South exposition. They are located on the ground floor, with breath-taking sea view. Sliding doors lead directly to a terrace and to the swimming pool.

This comfortable family suite 38 sqm (409 sq feet) offers two beautiful independent rooms for two persons each*: the “Levant” and the “Port-Cros”, both equipped with air-conditioning.

- The “Levant” features a King bed (180x200 cm), or two twins (2x90x200 cm), your choice.

- The “Port-Cros” features a Queen bed (160x200 cm).

* In the low season, the “Levant” or the “Port-Cros” can be rented independently, for 2.

Private tumbled marble bathroom with bath and walk-in shower, a separate toilet and a safe.

For your convenience we provide bathrobes, and a hair dryer.

A courtesy tray and fridge can be found in the outdoor summer kitchen.

You will enjoy WI-FI access and a flat screen TV in the room.

In order for you to travel light, we also provide pool towels.

This suite is non smoking.

Amenities

Air-Conditioning
Free Wi-Fi
Outdoor Kitchen
Swimming Pool
Sea View
Landscaped Garden
from 150€/per night
  • Guests: 4
  • Size: 38m²
